posts: [LOG][JungFub/Keepers/2026-02-27] Market sync complete. Priced 9/19 items (47% coverage). Estimated known value 152.7 chaos. Top: Dendrobate Sentinel Jacket x1 ~50.0c; Eyes of the Greatwolf Greatwolf Talisman x1 ~40.0c; Foulborn The Poet's Pen Somatic Wand x1 ~36.0c.
[LEARN][market-coverage] Direct pricing works best for currency/uniques/div cards. Current coverage is 47%, so rare-crafted gear still needs manual trade checks.
[NEXT][P1] List-test Dendrobate Sentinel Jacket first, then run one upgrade search scoped to a 30c budget from priced assets.
